SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards

Class CardResource

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.CardResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CardGolden
public class CardResource extends Card
Represents a resource card in the game, which has a specific color and points. Extends the abstract class Card.
See Also:

      public CardResource(Artifacts cardColor, int points, Map<CornerOrientation,Corner> corners)
      Constructs a CardResource with the specified color, points, and corners.
      Parameters:
      cardColor - The color of the card.
      points - The points of the card.
      corners - The corners of the card.

    • CardResource

      public CardResource(Artifacts cardColor, Map<CornerOrientation,Corner> corners)
      Constructs a CardResource with the specified color and corners. Points are set to 0 by default.
      Parameters:
      cardColor - The color of the card.
      corners - The corners of the card.

    • countPoints

      public int countPoints(CardMap cardMap, Coordinates coordinates, boolean faceUp)
      Calculates the points of the card based on its placement and faceUp status.
      Specified by:
      countPoints in class Card
      Parameters:
      cardMap - The card map containing the card.
      coordinates - The coordinates of the card.
      faceUp - Whether the card is face up or not.
      Returns:
      The points of the card.

    • getAllArtifacts

      public Map<Artifacts,Integer> getAllArtifacts(boolean faceUp)
      Retrieves all artifacts associated with the card based on its placement and faceUp status. If faceUp is true, retrieves artifacts from face-up corners only. If faceUp is false, retrieves only the central artifact.
      Specified by:
      getAllArtifacts in class Card
      Parameters:
      faceUp - Whether to retrieve artifacts from face-up or face-down corners.
      Returns:
      A map containing the artifacts and their counts.

    • getCornerType

      public CornerType getCornerType(CornerDirection direction, boolean faceUp)
      Retrieves the type of corner based on its direction and faceUp status. If faceUp is false, returns CornerType.EMPTY. Otherwise, delegates to the superclass method to get the corner type.
      Overrides:
      getCornerType in class Card
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction of the corner.
      faceUp - Whether the corner is face up or not.
      Returns:
      The type of corner.

    • getCornerArtifact

      public Artifacts getCornerArtifact(CornerDirection direction, boolean faceUp)
      Retrieves the artifact of the corner based on its direction and faceUp status. If faceUp is false, returns Artifacts.NULL. Otherwise, delegates to the superclass method to get the corner artifact.
      Overrides:
      getCornerArtifact in class Card
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction of the corner.
      faceUp - Whether the corner is face up or not.
      Returns:
      The artifact of the corner.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Checks whether this CardResource is equal to another object. Two CardResource objects are considered equal if they have the same color, points, and corners.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - The object to compare with this CardResource.
      Returns:
      true if the objects are equal; false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Generates a hash code for the CardResource object. The hash code is based on the color, points, and corners of the card.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      A hash code value for this CardResource object.

    • toRecord

      public CardRecord toRecord()
      Converts the CardResource object into a CardRecord for data transfer purposes. This method returns a CardRecord representation of the CardResource object.
      Specified by:
      toRecord in class Card
      Returns:
      A CardRecord representing the CardResource object.

    • toRecord

      public CardRecord toRecord(boolean faceUp)
      Converts the CardResource object into a CardRecord for data transfer purposes. This method returns a CardRecord representation of the CardResource object.
      Specified by:
      toRecord in class Card
      Parameters:
      faceUp - Whether to record the card as face up or not.
      Returns:
      A CardRecord representing the CardResource object with the specified faceUp status.
